actor_awards.notes: Best known for his role as The Chief in the TV series Get Smart.[[1](https://www.google.com/url?sa=E&q=https%3A%2F%2Fvertexaisearch.cloud.google.com%2Fgrounding-api-redirect%2FAUZIYQHT0B66ffPW4TLqMxzuYrg_tusN5OZXo_IFfly7EebTkb58qnKF_PJnHkgAbIg-b9anDBiuW6zUa_n3nFquyETEWuc793bFS1ZLFiUPfuxcIUTvjlI2RK658vEorYvK2GwcNXs4TM-gCOY4F5tnNBzoRGPwt4ubbPZVMNdAYq0ml8I87iD43BRU2Ut12c43Z1--OA%3D%3D)][[2](https://www.google.com/url?sa=E&q=https%3A%2F%2Fvertexaisearch.cloud.google.com%2Fgrounding-api-redirect%2FAUZIYQFABveXdebUS0kO5-WH2J5d1gz_HHHj6xrqo6Ty_XYxX722omIqV5aUeMsSImpYxq8Hb_g7RxyIIhzwLTi1gVqC2BDJSo5OaAlhhxjEt_MtdzgcKO0KQdvy3sFpU6NrvRcVBx2J)][[3](https://www.google.com/url?sa=E&q=https%3A%2F%2Fvertexaisearch.cloud.google.com%2Fgrounding-api-redirect%2FAUZIYQGzf4CZbPel4--5DxQE_oHhRst-JBBnDZohaPt1L3Zvegmw5smHQQY2DUbmxL1ItT7f1su8I20dnwEHrHtyjK_VuAVSZZWgmwzDrkulkKbXAwMInDkDNtbuVqD_WAF7uXz2yH8bUQ%3D%3D)][[4](https://www.google.com/url?sa=E&q=https%3A%2F%2Fvertexaisearch.cloud.google.com%2Fgrounding-api-redirect%2FAUZIYQFL3UG9YZZ2D4q6pd5aYkBLGdQjyBfqk3WF2XN-x5mzIIjioFth_dqOzALR-6bf2ulZo8C5OzBFe_SBr8-d4_r_bdINnnCMh1cKFfgvHMYU65cqhQ656KtmZ2jF8Yr97EMwVFd_)][[5](https://www.google.com/url?sa=E&q=https%3A%2F%2Fvertexaisearch.cloud.google.com%2Fgrounding-api-redirect%2FAUZIYQEN4KDKvnq0OqX7arq1QfKNF2LRBjnO0LfcJ_MMMn5_WDCso6329hoX_zpPHi8ztYjG2ksRjCq7-yc8vKPxUGklM6H7SfDX7v-6ulLtLLN7VnMZ9WLsFPnV1uvdDsso-rGeShPmhj1gXlPAex4KuA%3D%3D)] He was also an accomplished opera singer before turning to acting. Served in the US Army during WWII.

filmography.title: Rebel Without a Cause
filmography.role_description: A sympathetic juvenile officer who tries to help the troubled teenagers.
filmography.plot: A rebellious young man with a troubled past comes to a new town, finding friends and enemies.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Supporting Actor (Sal Mineo), Best Supporting Actress (Natalie Wood)

filmography.title: North by Northwest
filmography.role_description: An attorney and representative of the government agency involved in the spy plot.
filmography.plot: A New York City advertising executive is mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies and is pursued across the country.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Screenplay, Best Art Direction, Best Film Editing

filmography.title: Pollyanna
filmography.role_description: A townsman and husband of Amelia Tarbell in this Disney classic.
filmography.plot: A young orphan girl comes to a town that is embittered and depressed and brings a little sunshine into everyone's lives.

filmography.title: Cape Fear
filmography.role_description: The judge presiding over the legal proceedings involving the stalker Max Cady.
filmography.plot: A lawyer's family is stalked by a man he once helped send to jail.

filmography.title: Written on the Wind
filmography.role_description: A doctor who delivers life-changing news to the volatile Kyle Hadley.
filmography.plot: The alcoholic son of a Texas oil tycoon and his best friend fall for the same woman.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Supporting Actress (Dorothy Malone)

filmography.title: The Shrike
filmography.role_description: The brother of the protagonist, concerned about his mental state.
filmography.plot: A theater director is driven to a nervous breakdown by his domineering wife.

filmography.title: Illegal
filmography.role_description: The ambitious new District Attorney who replaces the protagonist.
filmography.plot: A District Attorney resigns in disgrace after sending an innocent man to the chair, then becomes a defense attorney for a crime boss.

filmography.title: The Steel Jungle
filmography.role_description: The judge who sentences a bookie to prison.
filmography.plot: A bookie goes to prison rather than squeal on the mob, but his silence threatens his wife's safety.

filmography.title: The Tattered Dress
filmography.role_description: A reporter covering a murder trial in a corrupt town.
filmography.plot: A lawyer defends a society couple for murder in a small town, only to be framed by the vengeful sheriff.

filmography.title: Oregon Passage
filmography.role_description: A rigid, jealous cavalry commander who clashes with his lieutenant and the local tribes.
filmography.plot: A cavalry lieutenant tries to prevent an Indian war while dealing with his commanding officer's hatred.

filmography.title: The Gift of Love
filmography.role_description: The doctor treating a dying woman who decides to adopt a child.
filmography.plot: A woman with a terminal heart condition adopts an orphan girl to keep her husband company after she's gone.

filmography.title: The Last of the Fast Guns
filmography.role_description: A man who runs a sanctuary for outlaws in Mexico.
filmography.plot: A gunslinger is hired to find a missing man in Mexico but finds himself in a moral dilemma.

filmography.title: Gunman's Walk
filmography.role_description: A town citizen and horse breeder involved in the conflict.
filmography.plot: A rancher tries to raise his two sons, but one becomes a killer, leading to a tragic confrontation.

filmography.title: The Proud Ones
filmography.role_description: The town doctor who diagnoses the marshal's failing eyesight.
filmography.plot: A marshal with vision problems faces a new threat when cowboys arrive in town.

filmography.title: Atlantis, the Lost Continent
filmography.role_description: The High Priest of Atlantis who opposes the corrupt rulers.
filmography.plot: A Greek fisherman brings a princess back to her homeland of Atlantis, only to find it enslaved by a power-mad king.

filmography.title: The Rebel Set
filmography.role_description: A mastermind who recruits three beatniks for a heist.
filmography.plot: A coffee shop owner recruits three struggling men to rob a money train.

filmography.title: Inside the Mafia
filmography.role_description: A crime boss whose home is used for a mafia summit.
filmography.plot: Gunmen take over a small airport to assassinate a mafia leader arriving for a summit.

filmography.title: The Explosive Generation
filmography.role_description: The high school principal who suspends a teacher for discussing sex.
filmography.plot: A high school teacher is suspended for allowing a class discussion on sex, sparking a student protest.

filmography.title: A Ticklish Affair
filmography.role_description: A Navy Captain involved in the investigation of a distress signal.
filmography.plot: A Navy commander falls for a widow with three sons who unintentionally signal the fleet.

filmography.title: They Came to Cordura
filmography.role_description: A Colonel involved in the assignment of Major Thorn.
filmography.plot: A cowardly officer is assigned to find heroes for the Medal of Honor during the 1916 Mexican expedition.

filmography.title: Cash McCall
filmography.role_description: The lawyer for the wealthy businessman Cash McCall.
filmography.plot: A corporate raider buys a failing plastics company and falls in love with the owner's daughter.

filmography.title: Summer Love
filmography.role_description: The concerned father of the young musician protagonist.
filmography.plot: A teen band gets a gig at a summer camp, leading to romance and complications.

filmography.title: The High Cost of Loving
filmography.role_description: The company president who is misunderstood by an insecure employee.
filmography.plot: A long-time employee fears he is about to be fired when he is left off a guest list, not knowing it's a mistake.

filmography.title: Damn Citizen
filmography.role_description: A mob boss who tries to bribe the new police superintendent.
filmography.plot: A WWII hero is appointed superintendent of the Louisiana State Police to clean up corruption.

filmography.title: Bullet for a Badman
filmography.role_description: A posse member who remains loyal to the lawman protagonist.
filmography.plot: A former Ranger must track down his old friend turned bank robber, who is also his wife's ex-husband.
